casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Errol Duke MOSES. No. 574A97-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 22, 2006. Steven Arbogast, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of May 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Errol Duke Moses) shall have up to and including the *9529th day of June 2006 to file and serve his/her Petition for Writ of Certiorari with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of May 2006."
